value.title: Amazon Comprehend Targeted Sentiment adds synchronous support
value.excerpt: Earlier this year, Amazon Comprehend, a natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning (ML) to discover insights from text, launched the Targeted Sentiment feature. value.title: NVIDIA gives updates on new GPU technologies at GTC conference
value.excerpt: It announced the GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs, which are powered by the company’s new Ada Lovelace architecture.

value.title: Responsible AI is a top management concern, so why aren’t organizations deploying it?
value.excerpt: Factors working against the adoption of responsible AI include a lack of agreement on what 'responsible AI' means along with a lack of talent, prioritization, and funding.

value.title: Startup Diveplane wants to make AI ethical: CEO explains what that means
value.excerpt: In today's world, artificial intelligence is used to make some big decisions. Colleges rely on it to admit students. Parole boards use it to approve or deny inmate releases.

value.title: Microsoft's October 12 Surface launch: What's on tap
value.excerpt: Surface launch event now has an official date but not a lot of other hints. Expectations are there could be a couple of Arm-based devices unveiled.

value.title: Improving accuracy of computer vision models, Voxel51 raises $12.5M
value.excerpt: Computer vision startup, Voxel51, helping data scientists ensure the accuracy of datasets used for computer vision, raises $12.5M series A.

value.title: Tech war: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang confident in China market despite US AI chip ban
value.excerpt: Jensen Huang says China continues to present a significant growth opportunity even after Washington restricted the Californian company from exporting two of its top chips to the country.

value.title: Arm Continues Its Datacenter Drive With Neoverse 2
value.excerpt: Senior Analyst, Servers, Matt Kimball, dives in as ARM recently announced Neoverse 2 – an updated IP portfolio designed to achieve greater performance, efficiency, and security gains. Matt unpacks Neoverse 2 and what this means for enterprise IT.

value.title: Brightflow AI aims to spotlight small business cash flow
value.excerpt: Brightflow AI automates financial services and disseminates that information in a way that a business owner can understand.

value.title: What can you expect on Tesla AI Day?
value.excerpt: Tesla AI Day is Tesla's annual event in which the company reveals all of its upcoming projects and showcases its latest technology. The event will take place on September 30 and is expected to be live-streamed on both the Tesla website and on YouTube.

value.title: AI And ML Have The Potential To Revolutionize How CMOs Conduct Campaigns
value.excerpt: Though people have talked about AI for more than 50 years, only now has it moved from a tech buzzword to part of the common vernacular. Having worked in fintech for the past 10 years, the uptake I’ve witnessed has led me to wholly believe in the immense value these technologies hold for communications professionals.

value.title: This Uncensored AI Art Tool Can Generate Fantasies—and Nightmares
value.excerpt: Artists are free to create fantasies or nightmares with unrestricted image generator Stable Diffusion, but some fear a flood of AI-made horrors.

value.title: The Role Of Explainable AI In Increasing Inclusion In Talent
value.excerpt: Abakar Saidov is co-founder and CEO of Beamery, a leader in talent lifecycle management. In the wake of the " Great Reshuffle ," companies continue to reevaluate their approach to recruitment and retention.

value.title: UNESCO urges government to consider ethics of AI in education as an absolute priority
value.excerpt: The report analysed that the AI market in India has the potential to touch INR 780 crores by 2025 at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 20.2% A report by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation (UNESCO) launched in Delhi on Tuesday encouraged an overall regulatory framework for use of artificial intelligence (AI) tools in education.

value.title: New York’s Landmark AI Bias Law Prompts Uncertainty
value.excerpt: Businesses and their service providers are grappling with how to comply with New York City’s mandate for audits of artificial intelligence systems used in hiring.

value.title: After Yang review – what to do when your AI robot child goes wrong?
value.excerpt: Kogonada’s enigmatic sci-fi drama channels Charlie Kaufman and Philip K Dick as Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner Smith try to fix the faulty AI bot they bought for their adopted daughter

value.title: Boulder County using artificial intelligence to spot wildfires
value.excerpt: Boulder County brought two new wildfire lookout cameras online Tuesday. They will use AI to detect wildfire smoke.

value.title: Nvidia introduces DLSS3 to generate AI-powered frames with 4X performance
value.excerpt: Nvidia's DLSS 3 will use AI to estimate the best way to fill out images in the company's latest graphics cards.

value.title: Salesforce built a data lake to transform how customer data moves on the platform
value.excerpt: Genie is a new data integration model that underlies the Salesforce platform with the aim of moving data wherever it’s needed most -- and doing it fast.

value.title: Elon Musk faces skeptics as Tesla gets ready to unveil 'Optimus' robot
value.excerpt: Tesla Chief Executive Elon Musk blamed overreliance on factory robots for sending the electric carmaker to "production hell" four years ago, saying humans were better at certain jobs.

value.title: Augment’s personal AI assistant could help you keep track of a scattered digital life
value.excerpt: Ever totally forget the person, email or document you're supposed to talk about in the next call? Augment's personal AI assistant might help.

value.title: Nvidia and Booz Allen develop Morpheus platform to supercharge security AI
value.excerpt: Nvidia and Booz Allen announce the launch of Morpheus, a security AI solution designed to offer greater data processing capabilities.
